name: Virtual Single Mom Manager Job
description:
Do you like virtual hotel management games? If yes then this new 'Single Mom Manager Job simulator' is for you. Waking your kids up is your first important task of the day in this hotel manager job game for kids. Get ready to enjoy performing your home activities in this single mom manager job virtual game. Play a virtual single mom simulator for your kids and your office boss in this manager job game. So, play this Virtual Single Mom Manager Job Game to take care of your happy virtual family and virtual good job.

Help your kids ready for the school, also manage the job to fulfill your dreamland of a big and happy family home in this virtual hotel game.

Virtual Single Mom Manager Job Features:
A time management mom simulator for kids
Manage all home and office tasks for your happy family life
Smooth and optimized controls
Addictive game-play for kids virtual game
High-Quality 3D graphics
Attractive sounds effects
Entertaining & interesting virtual family game
